title: La Cena
subtitle: Dinner
meta_desc: Learn dinner vocabulary in Spanish with audio pronunciation. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, Spanish food book, dinner Spanish, bilingual children books

pages.title: La Cena
pages.prompt: A warm family dinner table with pasta, salad, bread, and candles, cozy evening lighting, professional food photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La pizza es redonda.
